snippet: GROB--Annette Kreisler, 97, March 13, surrounded by her loving family. A vibrant, engaged woman, she was always ahead of her time and an inspiration to many. Her 59 year marriage to Stephen Grob was truly a love story. Cherished mother of Ellen Levy (Mark), Betsy Grob and Stephen Grob; grandmother of Abigail Levy (Bruce Levine), Eric Levy and Julia Grob (Kahlil Almustafa); great-grandma to Noa Levine; sister to Edith and Phil Hamerslough, Jack and Nancy Kreisler, Cecile Engel, Lois Markle. She will be deeply missed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GROB--Annette Kreisler, 97, March 13, surrounded by her loving family. A vibrant, engaged woman, she was always ahead of her time and an inspiration to many. She will be deeply missed. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GROB, ANNETTE KREISLER
